data.actual_result: There is no Users section, just Roles and Bans
data.expected_result: There should be Manage Users and Roles as options on the page
data.short_description: cannot manage users without Manage Server permission (since 1.10.0 1151)
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Manage Roles permissions but not manage channels permissions  - Open the server settings page on iOS where you would normally find Manage Users
